org.shared.net.filter.ssl

Class SslFilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.filter.ssl.SslFilterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SslFilterFactory
extends Object
implements FilterFactory<SslFilter,ByteBuffer,ByteBuffer,FilteredHandler<?,?,?>>, SslEngineFactory<SslFilterFactory>
    An implementation of FilterFactory that creates SslFilters.
